original_title: Lou Reed - Transformer & Live at Montreux 2000
overview: Live at Montreux 2000 is a concert DVD by Lou Reed, released in 2005 by Eagle Vision. It was recorded at the 2000 Montreux Jazz Festival in Montreux, Switzerland. Reed performed eight songs from the Album Ecstasy plus a few older ones. Lou Reed is one of the most influential artists of the rock era. From his days in the sixties as the main singer and songwriter of the Velvet Underground and through his mercurial solo career he has kept his audience and the critics on their toes with dramatic changes of musical direction from album to album. Underpinning everything however has been his unquestionable ability as a songwriter and performer of the highest class.  Tracklisting:  1) Paranoia Key Of E  2) Turn To Me  3) Modern Dance  4) Ecstasy  5) Smalltown  6) Future Farmers Of America  7) Turning Around Time  8) Romeo Had Juliette  9) Riptide  10) Rock Minuet  11) Mystic Child  12) Tatters  13) Set The Twilight Reeling  14) Dirty Blvd  15) Dime Store Mystery  16) Perfect Day
title: Lou Reed - Transformer & Live at Montreux 2000
